name: Noacrulockette
tagline: This is just my own continuation of Lockette by Acru Jovian. Copy and paste "fork" of the Lockette 1.6 from GitHub (Acru)
body:
NoAcruLockette
==============

This is just my own continuation of Lockette by Acru Jovian. 
Copy and paste "fork" of the Lockette 1.6 from GitHub (Acru).

The code base is that of Lockette 1.6 and PluginCore 1.3.2 by Acru Jovian, 
taken from GitHub (https://github.com/Acru).

Adaptions by asofold.

LICENSE
--------------------------
Orientation is that of Lockette (to be updated), see README_LOCKETTE.txt and README_PLUGIN_CORE.txt

Lockette and PluginCore for Bukkit, written by Acru Jovian.
Distributed under the The Non-Profit Open Software License version 3.0 (NPOSL-3.0)
http://www.opensource.org/licenses/NOSL3.0

Adapted by asofold, license preserved.
